snippet: Seven years after being struck in the back of the head by a 92-mile-per-hour fastball, Adam Greenberg got a second plate appearance in the majors, this time with the Marlins.
abstract: Miami Marlins beat New York Mets, 4-3, in 11 innings; Miami's Adam Greenberg gets a second plate appearance in the majors, seven years after being struck in the back of the head by a 92-mile-per-hour fastball.
lead_paragraph: Seven years after being struck in the back of the head by a 92-mile-per-hour fastball, Adam Greenberg got a second plate appearance in the majors, this time with the Marlins.

headline.seo: Marlins’ Adam Greenberg Strikes Out in Second Chance
headline.main: An Out Well Worth Waiting 7 Years For
headline.print_headline: An Out Well Worth Waiting 7 Years For
